column3:
The digest are the same:
```
docker image inspect ubuntu:focal ubuntu:20.04 | jq -r  '.[].RepoDigests[0]'
ubuntu@sha256:626ffe58f6e7566e00254b638eb7e0f3b11d4da9675088f4781a50ae288f3322
ubuntu@sha256:626ffe58f6e7566e00254b638eb7e0f3b11d4da9675088f4781a50ae288f3322
```
```
docker image inspect ubuntu:hirsute ubuntu:21.04 | jq -r  '.[].RepoDigests[0]'
ubuntu@sha256:26cd4ff32a9c031eaca

I'd do not touch CI task `name`s as they already are long enough and not readable in the GitHub web-interface:

![Screenshot from 2021-11-13 11-44-18](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/141614166-7b7022d7-3d1d-4c5d-8f06-d66f24ec182e.png)

> I'd do not touch CI task `name`s as they already are long enough and not readable in the GitHub web-interface:
> 
True, but are readable [here](https://cirrus-ci.com/build/6370279250198528)
What about changing the ubuntu image names to all dates, i.e. align the  `.cirrus.yaml` with `ci/test/*.sh`?

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.
